text: Fundació Esportiva Grama is a Spanish football team based in Santa Coloma de Gramenet, Barcelona in the autonomous community of Catalonia. Founded on 2 July 2013, it plays in Tercera División – Group 5, holding home games at Nou Municipal de Gramenet, with a capacity of 5,000. ==Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !Season !Tier !Division !Place !Copa del Rey |- |style="background:#99A61C;"|2013/14 !style="background:#99A61C;"|8 |style="background:#99A61C;"| |style="background:#99A61C;"|9th !style="background:#EFEFEF;"| |- |style="background:#99A61C;"|2014/15 !style="background:#99A61C;"|8 |style="background:#99A61C;"| |style="background:#99A61C;"|1st !style="background:#EFEFEF;"| |- |style="background:#77DD77;"|2015/16 !style="background:#77DD77;"|7 |style="background:#77DD77;"| |style="background:#77DD77;"|1st !style="background:#EFEFEF;"| |- |style="background:#25A8F9;"|2016/17 !style="background:#25A8F9;"|6 |style="background:#25A8F9;"| |style="background:#25A8F9;"|1st !style="background:#EFEFEF;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|2017/18 !style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"| |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1st !style="background:#EFEFEF;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|2018/19 !style="background:#FF7F00;"|4 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"|18th !style="background:#EFEFEF;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|2019/20 !style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"| |style="background:#CECE1B;"|2nd !style="background:#EFEFEF;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|2020/21 !style="background:#FF7F00;"|4 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"| !style="background:#EFEFEF;"| |} |} \---- *2 seasons in Tercera División ==References== ==External links== *Official website *Fútbol Regional team profile *Soccerway team profile Category:Football clubs in Catalonia Category:Association football clubs established in 2013 Category:2013 establishments in Spain Category:Santa Coloma de Gramenet
